title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Analysis of Key Success Factors for Implementing Higher Education E-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in online learning environments
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate at least 15 specific critical success factors (CSFs) across the four core domains of higher education e-learning implementation (leadership, design, technology, operations).
Through project-based collaboration, learners can diagnose barriers to e-learning adoption in local communities and propose actionable improvement strategies.
Based on learning outcome evaluation criteria, stakeholders can derive three or more stakeholder requirements to consider when establishing e-learning strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
